controller.name: Telegram
controller.division:
your rights regarding your personal data.
	
	1.4. EEA Representative
controller.address: Unlike other services, we don't use your data for ad targeting or other commercial purposes. Telegram only stores the information it needs to function as a secure and feature-rich cloud service.

rightToInformation.description:
You provide your mobile number and basic account data (which may include profile name, profile picture and about information) to create a Telegram account.
	
	To make it easier for your contacts and other people to reach you and recognize who you are, the screen name you choose, your profile pictures, and your username (should you choose to set one) on Telegram are always public.

rightToRectificationOrDeletion.description: You have a right to: (1) request a copy of all your personal data that we store and to transmit that copy to another data controller; (2) delete (see section 10 below) or amend your personal data;

rightToComplain.description: You have a right to: (1) request a copy of all your personal data that we store and to transmit that copy to another data controller; (2) delete (see section 10 below) or amend your personal data; (3) restrict, or object to, the processing of your personal data; (4) correct any inaccurate or incomplete personal data we hold on you; and (5) lodge a complaint with national data protection authorities regarding our processing of your personal data.

supervisoryAuthority.name: data protection authorities
supervisoryAuthority.address:
If you would like more information regarding these clauses, please contact us using the details in section 12 below.
	8.3. Law Enforcement Authoritie
supervisoryAuthority.country:
If you would like more information regarding these clauses, please contact us using the details in section 12 below.
	8.3. Law Enforcement Authoritie

automatedDecisionMaking.logicInvolved: In any of the above cases, the developers of an automated user (bot) can get your public account data (see section 3.
automatedDecisionMaking.scopeAndIntendedEffects: In any of the above cases, the developers of an automated user (bot) can get your public account data (see section 3.

changesOfPurpose.description: To improve the security of your account, as well as to prevent spam, abuse, and other violations of our Terms of Service, we may collect metadata such as your IP address, devices and Telegram apps you've used, history of username changes, etc. If collected, this metadata can be kept for 12 months maximum.
We will review and may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes to this Privacy Policy will become effective when we post the revised Privacy Policy on this page www.
Please check our website frequently to see any updates or changes to our Privacy Policy, a summary of which we will set out below.

5 to 3.4 and 3.3.6 to 3.6.
	
	Important changes made to this Privacy Policy will be notified to you via Telegram.
